short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Group tabs by domain, close duplicates, and save tab lists before closing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A collection of tools to organize your Chrome Tabs. The four main features are:

1. Group Tabs by Domain.
2. Close all Duplicate Tabs. (Must be exact matches).
3. Sort Tabs by Date Opened. (Oldest to Newest)
4. Save & Close all tabs. (Saves all URLs to a bookmarked folder with the name of MM/DD/YYYY-HH:MM).
